eps.name: Lizard
eps.desc: Josh is dumped by his girlfriend Maggie and has a difficult time moving on. His best friend Mike encourages him to find a new girlfriend. Later, Josh meets a girl, Laura, on a train and asks for her number.

eps.name: raib
eps.desc: Josh agonizes over how to ask Laura out to dinner in a text message. She later agrees to dinner, however their first date does not go well.

eps.name: Pitbull
eps.desc: Mike takes Josh out to a club hoping to hook-up, however Josh is insecure of how to pick-up women.
